name: Crash League
description:
This is an early prototype of a physics-based arena car battle game.

(Inspired by Crush Gear the toy and anime)

2 Xinput Gamepad Required

Controls:

Left Stick = Turn Left & Right

A = Jump

B = Boost

X = Handbrake | Roll (While mid-air)

Planned Ideas & Mechanics(Ordered by Priority):

  • Full 4 Local-Multiplayer with Gamepad Support
  • Interchangeable Battle Gear Parts
  • Gear Part Durability/Destruction
  • 1v1, 2v2 FFA Game Modes
  • LAN Play Support

Thank you for playing and please comment ideas and suggestions below.
